que tu serais plus heureux

qui te répète que tu es précieux

The Bottom.

En me regardant,

Et on fait quoi
une fois qu'on l'a devant nous ?

translation.en: He's not gonna surrender.
It's him.
[Baron] Can I talk to him?
I want to be the one to tell him we're all BFFs now.
translation.fr:
Je veux lui annoncer
qu'on a fait ami-ami.

translation.en: -[cell phone continues to ring] -Take it.
-This is Junior. -[Clay] Are you with Brogan?
translation.fr: Ici Junior. Tu es avec Brogan ?

translation.en: Why would I be with him? You sent me to kill him, didn't you?
translation.fr: Vous m'avez envoyé le tuer, non ?

translation.en: [Clay] Doesn't matter. Just run.
-What? -[Clay] Run. Get away from him, now.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Tire-toi, reste pas avec lui.

translation.en: -Junior, I just want you safe. -[Junior] Why?
Because I'm your favorite experiment?
[Clay] No, because I'm your father and you need to listen to me. Run!
translation.fr:
Non, je suis ton père
et tu vas m'écouter. Tire-toi !

translation.en: -[Junior] Get out of the car! -[Henry] Go, go!
Baron! [pants] No!
[Danny] Come on!
I'm sorry, Henry.
[grunts] Shit!
[man 1] Move out. Go! Go!
-[Clay] Chief Mitchell? -[Mitchell] Go ahead.
Clay Verris. I need your units to stand down.
translation.fr:
Clay Verris. - Retenez vos unités.
- Pardon ?

translation.en: -[Mitchell] Sir? -We're engaging with a terror cell that has a weaponized biological capability.
translation.fr:
Nous combattons une cellule terroriste
équipée d'une arme biologique.

translation.en: [Mitchell] All units, fall back immediately.
[Clay] Federal authorities have been notified and are en route.
translation.fr: Les autorités fédérales sont en chemin.

translation.en: [Mitchell] Affirmative. Keep me posted, Clay.
[Clay] Yes, sir.
[Junior] You gotta stand your men down now.
You did the right thing, Junior, walking away from him.
translation.fr: Tu as bien fait de t'éloigner de lui.

translation.en: I did what a coward would do.
-Makes me sick! -I was asking too much of you.
translation.fr: Ça me débecte ! J'ai été trop exigeant avec toi.

translation.en: I can see that now.
He deserves better than a missile shot into his car, Pop.
translation.fr:
Il mérite mieux qu'un tir de missile
dans sa bagnole, papa.

translation.en: It doesn't matter what he deserves. He has to die.
translation.fr: Peu importe ce qu'il mérite, il doit mourir.

translation.en: -Are you gonna call those goons off now? -No. But you can.
translation.fr: Vous rappelez vos gros bras ? Non, mais vas-y, toi.

translation.en: Just fire that. Take command.
translation.fr:
Un coup de feu
et tu prends les commandes.

translation.en: [Henry] Armor is weak at the joints. Eyes and neck are the kill shots.
translation.fr:
Sur un pare-balles,
vise les yeux et le cou.

translation.en: Take right, I take left.
translation.fr: Toi à droite, moi à gauche.

translation.en: [Henry] Muzzle discipline.
Watch your round count. You set, I spike.
translation.fr:
Surveille ta conso.
Tu fixes, j'allume.

translation.en: -Ready? -Roger that.
-[Danny] I'm out! -[Henry] Take cover!
translation.fr:
- Je suis à sec !
- À couvert.

translation.en: Set!
[Danny] Frag out!
-I am trying to make you a man! -[grunts]
translation.fr:
J'essaie de faire de toi
un homme.

translation.en: I should've cloned myself.
"Loving, dedicated, present father."
[man 4] Right side!
Go ahead.
Do it.
How many rounds you got left? [pants]
One.
I'm sorry.
For what?
-For getting you into this. -I was the one surveilling you.
translation.fr: De t'avoir entraînée là-dedans. Je te surveillais.

translation.en: Yeah.
Anyway... sorry.
Now let's fight our way out of this thing.
translation.fr: On va se battre, on y arrivera.

translation.en: You're a great partner.
translation.fr: C'est génial de faire équipe avec toi.

translation.en: [Henry] Thank you.
Sorry I ran.
Yeah, well, it's been a rough night. How many more out there?
translation.fr: C'est compliqué. Il en reste, dehors ?

translation.en: I didn't see any.
[Henry] Verris?
Out of commission.
But still alive?
Yes.
Here.
How bad is that? I'm fine.
You're not.
Hold the elevated position. We're gonna secure an out.
translation.fr:
Couvre-nous d'en haut,
on dégage une sortie.

translation.en: Back off!
Don't you feel pain?
translation.fr: Tu ne ressens pas la douleur ?

translation.en: [Clay] I don't know why you're so angry,
translation.fr: Je ne comprends pas ta colère, Henry.

translation.en: You were the inspiration for all of this.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui as inspiré tout ça.

translation.en: You know where I got the idea? Are you okay?
Khafji.
Watching you go house to house, wishing I had a whole division of men
translation.fr:
Je te regardais
en rêvant de n'avoir que des hommes

translation.en: all as good as you.
Wondering if that could be possible.
translation.fr: Je me demandais si ce serait possible.

translation.en: -You should be flattered. -[scoffs]
You should be dead.
[Clay] You saw what happened over there.
translation.fr: Tu as vu ce qui s'est passé là-bas.

translation.en: Atrocities.
Friends being sent home in a pine box.
translation.fr:
Les copains qui rentrent
entre quatre planches.

translation.en: Why should we accept that... if there's a better way?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi accepter ça
s'il y a une meilleure solution ?

translation.en: And look what we created.
translation.fr: Et regarde ce qu'on a créé.

translation.en: He's got both of us in him.
Don't you think your country deserves...
translation.fr:
Ton pays ne mérite-t-il pas
une version parfaite de toi ?

translation.en: -perfect version of you? -There is no perfect version of me.
translation.fr:
Ton pays ne mérite-t-il pas
une version parfaite de toi ? Il n'y a pas de version parfaite de moi.

translation.en: Or him. Or anybody. [Clay] No?
translation.fr: Ni de lui ni de personne.

translation.en: He was on his way to Yemen. Now, thanks to you,
translation.fr:
Il devait aller au Yémen. Grâce à toi, il sera remplacé
par quelqu'un qui a des parents,

translation.en: his place is gonna be taken by someone with parents.
translation.fr:
Grâce à toi, il sera remplacé
par quelqu'un qui a des parents,

translation.en: Someone who feels pain... fear,
translation.fr: qui ressent la douleur, la peur,

translation.en: which we had edited out of him. Someone with just as many weaknesses
translation.fr: ce dont nous l'avions dépourvu. Quelqu'un d'aussi faible

translation.en: as the terrorists that we're trying to kill.
And you're gonna tell me that's better?
So, why not make a whole army of them?
Yeah. Why not?
Think how many American families we could spare.
Nobody's son or daughter would ever have to die.
translation.fr: Aucun fils, aucune fille ne mourrait.

translation.en: No vet comes home with PTSD and kills himself.
translation.fr:
Aucun vétéran en post-trauma
ne se suiciderait.

translation.en: We can keep the whole world safe without any actual grief.
translation.fr:
On assurerait la sécurité mondiale
sans provoquer la moindre peine.

translation.en: So, who would I be hurting?
You're talking about people, Clay.
Henry...
this is the most humane thing that Gemini's ever done.
translation.fr:
Gemini n'a jamais fait preuve
d'autant d'humanité.

translation.en: How many more of me are running around out there?
translation.fr:
Y a encore combien de moi
en circulation ?

translation.en: There's only one you, Junior.
translation.fr: Il n'y a qu'un seul toi, Junior.

translation.en: He was a weapon.
You're my son.
And I love you...
as much as any father ever loved any kid.
translation.fr:
Plus qu'aucun père
n'a jamais aimé son enfant.

translation.en: I don't have a father.
Goodbye, Clay. [Henry] Hey, hey.
So, what the hell are we gonna do, huh?
Gonna turn him in?
They're not gonna try him. They're not gonna shut down his lab.
translation.fr: Il sera jamais jugé, son labo sera pas fermé.

translation.en: -We have to end this right now. -[Henry] Hey.
translation.fr: C'est à nous d'en finir, tout de suite.

translation.en: Look at me.
Look at me.
You pull that trigger,
and you're gonna break something inside of yourself...
translation.fr: quelque chose va se casser en toi

translation.en: that'll never get fixed again.
Don't.
Let it go.
Give it to me.
You don't want those ghosts.
Trust me.
[Henry] You should know better than that.
Surprised you give a shit.
Well, we can't be friends anymore.
Because you did let them try to kill me.
translation.fr:
tu les as laissés
essayer de me tuer.

translation.en: But doesn't mean I want to see you drink yourself to death.
translation.fr:
Mais j'ai pas envie
de te voir crever ivre mort.

translation.en: The Gemini lab's been dismantled.
translation.fr: Le labo de Gemini a été détruit.

translation.en: Cloning program is history.
translation.fr: Le programme de clonage n'existe plus.

translation.en: And Junior?
He's untouchable.
No one will bother him... ever.
translation.fr: Personne ne lui fera jamais d'ennuis.

translation.en: And we checked. There are no more clones.
translation.fr:
Et on a vérifié,
il n'y a aucun autre clone.

translation.en: What about you?
IG called.
I'm looking at charges, but if I bury Janet...
translation.fr:
Ils ont de quoi m'inculper, mais si je fais tomber Janet,
ils seront cléments.

translation.en: I can make a deal.
translation.fr:
mais si je fais tomber Janet,
ils seront cléments.

translation.en: Well, she earned it.
I'm really sorry, Henry.
-Take care, Del. -Yeah. You, too.
translation.fr: Prends soin de toi. Toi aussi.

translation.en: And happy retirement.
Good to see you.
Uh, congrats on the promotion. I hear they got big plans.
translation.fr: Bravo pour ta promo. Ils ont de grands projets pour toi.

translation.en: Well, after you, -pretty sure I can handle anything. -[Henry chuckles]
translation.fr: Après toi, rien ne me fait peur.

translation.en: How have you been?
Good. I just, uh, settled Baron's estate,
translation.fr:
- Comment ça va ?
- Très bien. J'ai géré la succession de Baron,

translation.en: scattered his ashes in the Caribbean.
translation.fr:
j'ai répandu ses cendres
dans les Caraïbes.

translation.en: I don't know. All I want to do now is put some good in the world.
translation.fr:
Maintenant, j'ai envie de faire
quelque chose de positif.

translation.en: I just got to figure out how.
-Yeah, you will. -Hmm.
You sleeping okay?
Uh, better.
-No ghosts? -Not like before.
And I actually looked in a mirror the other day.
translation.fr:
Je me suis regardé dans le miroir,
l'autre jour.

translation.en: -Really? -It wasn't horrendous.
translation.fr:
- Sans blague ?
- C'était pas si horrible.

translation.en: Speaking of mirrors...
-[Junior] Catch you later. -[boy] See you later, man.
-What's this? -This is you.
Passport, birth certificate, driver's license.
translation.fr:
Passeport,
acte de naissance, permis de conduire.

translation.en: -Apparently you got pretty good credit. -[chuckles]
I love the name you chose.
translation.fr: J'adore le prénom que tu as choisi.

translation.en: Jackson?
translation.fr:
Jackson ?
Le nom de ma mère.

translation.en: -It was my mother's name. -Hey, she was my mother first.
translation.fr:
Jackson ?
Le nom de ma mère. La mienne d'abord.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yeah, yeah. -Don't you "yeah, yeah" me, young man.
Come on. I know a great place for lunch.
translation.fr: Venez, je connais un bon petit restau.

translation.en: -So, you settled on a major yet? -Oh, leaning towards engineering.
translation.fr: Tu as choisi ta matière principale ? Sans doute l'ingénierie.

translation.en: -Engineering? -Uh.
Yeah, you should listen to her.
Uh, if I were you, which I sort of am, I'd go with computer science.
translation.fr:
Si j'étais toi,
ce que je suis plus ou moins, je ferais de l'informatique.

translation.en: [Danny] Save that for grad school.
translation.fr:
Attends le troisième cycle.
Fais des lettres.

translation.en: -You want to start in humanities. -Okay, don't listen to her.
translation.fr:
Attends le troisième cycle.
Fais des lettres. Ne l'écoute pas.

translation.en: -Don't listen to him. -Guys?
-You need a grounding in the classics. -Well, excuse me,
translation.fr: Il faut une base classique. Tu permets ? Je me parle, là.

translation.en: -I'm trying to talk with myself here. -Guys.
translation.fr: Tu permets ? Je me parle, là.

translation.en: You're talking to yourself, but you're not talking to him.
translation.fr: C'est à lui qu'il faut parler.

translation.en: Look, I-- I just made a lot of mistakes when I was young--
translation.fr:
J'ai fait plein d'erreurs
quand j'étais jeune.

translation.en: And I'd actually like to make some of those mistakes myself.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais bien
en faire certaines aussi.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, I made them already, so you don't have to.
translation.fr: Je les ai faites, t'as pas besoin.

translation.en: -Yeah, but he's not you. -[Junior] Okay, everybody. Chill the hell out.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas toi.
- Hé, vous deux... On déstresse.

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
If you're okay...
I'm okay.
-[chuckles] -[Henry] What?
I just can't believe that in 30 years, I'm gonna look like you.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à croire que dans 30 ans, je serai comme toi.

translation.en: -What? Please. You wish. -[Junior chuckling]
Boy, you better hope you look like me in-- in 30 years.
translation.fr:
Tu seras content
d'être comme moi dans 30 ans.

translation.en: This is 50-year-old, mature man meat you're looking at.
translation.fr: Tu as devant toi un beau mâle de 50 ans en pleine maturité.

translation.en: -[Danny] Fifty-one. -[Henry] I brush, I floss, I work hard.
translation.fr:
Cinquante et un. Je m'entretiens.
Je bosse dur.

translation.en: When you're 50, I bet you won't be dragging your ass
around the track every morning like I do.
translation.fr: que tu coures tous les matins comme moi.

translation.en: In fact, we can race now.
translation.fr: D'ailleurs, on n'a qu'à faire la course.

translation.en: We can race right now. We'll take it to the corner right now.
translation.fr: On fait la course jusqu'au croisement.
